text: Dominic Chianese (born February 24, 1931 in The Bronx, New York)Dominic Chianese Biography (1934?-) is an American actor, singer, musician, activist, and philanthropist. He is best known for his role as Corrado "Junior" Soprano on the HBO TV series The Sopranos. In 2010, Chianese received the Ellis Island Medal of Honor in recognition of his humanitarian efforts. He was born in Bronx, New York. ==References== ==Other websites== * * *A conversation with Dominic Chianese, The Sopranos' Uncle Junior in *Dominic Chianese - Downstage Center interview at American Theatre Wing.org Category:1931 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:American voice actors Category:American philanthropists Category:American activists Category:Actors from New York City Category:Singers from New York City Category:Musicians from New York City
title: Dominic Chianese
